Name: OVERGRAVITY
About the game: Overgravity is a 2D multi-player space themed shooter. The main feature that distinguishes it from other shooters is the speed of the gameplay, not to mention the dozens of weapons and powerups. There are also six single-player modes which can be highly customized. Single-player: Normal mode Unstable mode (the map change during the match) Coins mode (every damage generate a coins explosion, who has the most coins wins) Vampire mode Capture the flag 8 different Tournaments Multi-player: Normal match Team deathmatch
Meta Title: OVERGRAVITY: Jul 24, 2015, Tinycorp and Full Overview
